AbstractThesaurus - Class in com.barrysheehan.www
Implements WordMap to create a thesaurus in which words in the dictionary Set provide possible values for any words added as keys to the wordMap map.

swapText(String) - Method in class com.barrysheehan.www.TextSimplifier
Simplifies a String supplied to it by testing each word within it against the keys stored in the wordMap variable of thesaurus, swapping words when appropriate and returning the simplified text.

Reads a supplied String of text and returns the same text with appropriate words changed to match a word or words predefined in the program.
